description: In order to support Ironic/Neutron integration, there is a need to identify Ironic ports. Presently defined vnic types does not help with this. Therefore, a new type is needed.
title: Nova does not support baremetal vnic

comments.content: In order to support Ironic/Neutron integration, there is a need to identify Ironic ports. Presently defined vnic types does not help with this. Therefore, a new type is needed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sukhdev-8

comments.content: Lack of support for a thing does not a bug make, so this is wishlist.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Closed bug as invalid, this blueprint covers the work https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/ironic-networks-support
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jim-rollenhagen

comments.content: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/237067 has been raised to get a spec up for this work.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mrda
